meanings.definition: To make a solemn promise or agreement to do something.
meanings.sent1: She was pledging to always help her friends in need.
meanings.sent2: The students were pledging to follow the school rules.
meanings.sent3: After pledging to clean his room, he found it was messier than he thought.
meanings.sent4: By pledging to be honest, she gained the trust of her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: Pledging to protect the environment, the group planted trees in the park.

meanings.definition: To commit oneself to a particular course of action.
meanings.sent1: He was pledging to exercise every day to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: The team was pledging to work hard and improve their performance.
meanings.sent3: Pledging to eat only vegetables, he found himself craving a burger.
meanings.sent4: By pledging to learn a new language, she opened up new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The athlete was pledging to train rigorously for the upcoming competition.

meanings.sent1: She was pledging to donate money to the charity every month.
meanings.sent2: The company was pledging to support local businesses in the community.
meanings.sent3: After pledging to share his snacks, he realized he was hungry.
meanings.sent4: By pledging to volunteer at the shelter, she made a positive impact.
meanings.sent5: Pledging to give back, the group organized a fundraiser for a good cause.
